data.text:
Razan Amirah

Razan obtained her bachelor’s degree in pharmacy from the University of Petra. Since graduation, she has worked as a medical sales representative, and her role has included educating medical doctors about the uses and side effects of various drugs. Razan is an active member of a youth initiative to help vulnerable locals and refugees with in-kind and voluntary work.

Education
